Created an attachment (id=24742)
Shows origin of culprit

The project called "firmware" is deleted.

There was a source lookup path item added to the debug session that referred to 
a deleted project.

Removing it fixed the NPE.

How are project's added to source lookup path handled when the projects are 
deleted?

Added checks to prevent NPE. 
The AbstractSourceLookupDirector class creates the source containers. Maybe the 
containers for deleted projects or folders shouldn't be created.
